title: Beachfront Apartments in Sri Lanka, Mirissa
details:
A prime luxury beachfront apartment located on the golden shores of Mirissa in the southern coast of Sri Lanka, Elysian Mirissa promises you one of the finest holiday homes in Sri Lanka. Covering nearly three acres of land, each tower is designed to offer spectacular views of the shimmering waters of the Indian Ocean.

Our beachfront apartments are located on the sun-kissed crescent-shaped beach of Mirissa, a coastal town in south Sri Lanka. A top spot for dolphin and whale watching, Mirissa is a popular tourist destination.


TOWER ONE
Tower 1 of Elysian Mirissa features one and two bedroom Sri Lanka holiday apartments set on the beachfront, amidst stunning views of an endless horizon where sea meets sky; experience contemporary luxury & the true essence of the island’s south coast.
